meanings.definition: Skens (noun): a type of small, fast-moving fish
meanings.sent1: The skens darted through the water with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of skens swimming gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent3: The skens decided to have a race to see who was the fastest fish.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as swift as a skens in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The skens shimmered in the sunlight, a blur of silver in the water.

meanings.definition: Skens (verb): to move quickly and stealthily
meanings.sent1: He skens past the guards without making a sound.
meanings.sent2: The cat skens around the house, trying to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The ninja skens through the shadows, unseen by anyone.
meanings.sent4: Time seems to skens by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The wind skens through the trees, rustling the leaves gently.

meanings.definition: Skens (adjective): describing something that is quick and agile
meanings.sent1: The skens cheetah raced across the savannah.
meanings.sent2: She had a skens mind, always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The skens squirrel outsmarted all the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His skens reflexes saved him from getting hit by the ball.
meanings.sent5: The skens athlete broke the world record in the sprint.
